name: Beat Cop
summary: Beat Cop. A retro, pixel art style adventure in New York, inspired by '80s cop shows. You are Jack Kelly and you've been framed for murder. Now as a regular beat cop you have to find out, who did that. Expect thick crime story, a lot of black humour and all the other things you can find on the streets of Brooklyn.
